title: This year must bring greater collaboration against orbital congestion
summary: The article discusses the urgent issue of orbital congestion and space debris, highlighting the need for global collaboration, regulatory measures, and technological advancements to ensure space sustainability. It mentions the role of new actors, advancements in debris tracking, AI-based collision avoidance, and active debris removal technologies, but does not describe any concrete corporate events such as acquisitions, mergers, investments, or partnerships involving specific companies like AVIO.
